ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] More on Hate lists
ygData.msgSnippet: Another possibility is that if anyone passed thru the AoE of one of your songs while they were on the hate list of a mob, you got added to it even though your
ygData.messageBody:
Another possibility is that if anyone passed thru the AoE of one of your
songs while they were on the hate list of a mob, you got added to it even
though your song did not affect them. This has been the basis for many
non0-Kunark examples of Bard hate that occurred in the past. I have seen
this happen for sure at least twice with Accel. Someone ran past me just as
my song pulsed and the mob, though obviously well outside of a well known
agro range, (Crushbone Orc) turned and made a beeline for me.

Kit

Right, we accounted for that, he gated (which in FV is a "loading please
wait" op) and I zoned. Everything was fine for a while, then, with no
particular good reason (we hadn't let a runner go for instance) I became the
hot topic of the Drachnid public's venomous malintent.When they came, they
came to me. Now part of that *might* be that I was singing Clarity when they

Tszaaz
